alert.note: Alert for Billings (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL BILLINGS COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM MDT... At 352 PM MDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of South Fairfield, or 33 miles northwest of Dickinson, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Billings County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
